originalText.text:
Just went to butterfield in Madison Ave and it is seriously a game-changer for my grocery runs. This is my go-to upscale grocery store now . They got a bright , clean space filled with Fresh produce, yummy desserts , and variety of lunch and dinner options.
Treat yourself to frozen yogurt or enjoy a hot chocolate. Their friendly staff and inviting atmosphere makes shopping here a breeze. Butterfield Market isn‚Äôt just a store, it‚Äôs where you find your food paradise.
Come explore and discover the goodness!

originalText.text: I stopped in here because I was hearing a lot of good things about their hot chocolate so I had to see what the hype was about and they weren‚Äôt kidding they have awesome hot chocolate!!. Definitely lives up to the hype!!. I also bought some cookies which I‚Äôm looking forward to trying soon!. I will Definitely be back!!.

originalText.text:
What a find.  This place is special.  The type of niche and exclusive store you would expect to find here or at Martha's Vineyard.  Everything belongs here and in the quantities they ought.  This market belongs in this echelon, the best way to describe is this place is if Whole Foods and Traders Joes got together reduced their products to just the top 25% of their most favored items sprinkle a little truffle-flakes on it!  My goodness, this store had yellow flesh watermelon, a rarity especially this far from the farms that produce it further south.  For a snack we got some matzah ball soup.  It was soul-healing and my first experience.  Apparently this place has good ice cream/ gelato/whatever cold treat is.
There was a line outside the walk-up window just for this.  If you see this place, do yourself a favor and just walk through and peruse there offerings.  Great experience.

originalText.text:
This shop is breathtaking! I gasped as I wandered and explored the beautiful array of pastries, salads, foods and sandwiches. They are known for their ice creams and while I did not buy one right then, I will certainly be back. A pint of their branded ice cream is $16 so it is sure to be phenomenal- waiting for that 90 degree day to justify such a luxurious ice cream purchase.
What a beautiful uplifting experience üíúüè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà
They are frozen yogurt and a florist as well üåπ üç¶ üíê

originalText.text:
Butterfield ON A MISSION

To create the Butterfield Market Experience by offering the highest quality food that is fresh, delicious and enticing. Presented with style and care, inspired by trends and loyal to comforting classics. Customer service delivered with friendliness, professionalism and expertise in an environment that is warm, inviting and elegant.
